About-intro: Service and personalized client support have always been the major focus at Exel-Tech, which was started by Mr. Costas Psyharis in 1987. All of our professional IT staff members are technically trained to service every clients personal IT requirements.
About-body: Our philosophy at EXEL-TECH is to treat our customers the way we would like to be treated ourselves. Our clients are like friends to which we offer our best opinions and suggestions on a variety of products and services in an effort to meet their needs and the needs of the constantly growing IT world. Our staff members continuously receive training on new products, services and changing technologies as they come our way. With the collaboration of Intel, Supermicro and Microsoft, Exel-Tech has moved into new and wider markets, which include the Provincial and Federal government sectors. As the number one Intel Premier Provider of server hardware, Exel-Tech is geared to meet our clients needs in a timely manner. We are always expanding our knowledge to meet the demands and implement the best solutions to suit the needs of our customers.
